This is the first study to note that elevated systemic CCL5 and CXCL6 were associated with moderate/severe lumbar disc degeneration. These chemokines may be systemic biomarkers for the diagnosis and monitoring of disc degeneration.

wikipathways.name: SARS-CoV-2 innate immunity evasion and cell-specific immune response

summary: The protein encoded by this gene is a member CXC chemokine family. The encoded protein is a chemotactic for neutrophil granulocytes and has antibacterial action against gram-negative and gram-positive bacteria. This gene and other members of the CXC chemokine gene family form a gene cluster in a region of chromosome 4q. [provided by RefSeq, Jun 2020].
